Procreate 2 is finally here, completely redesigned for iOS 7 and 64-bit optimised for the new iPad Air and iPad mini with Retina Display.

Along with the beautiful new iOS 7 redesign Procreate 2 now includes powerful new GPU accelerated filters and adjustments:
- Gaussian Blur
- Sharpen
- Noise
- Hue, saturation & brightness
- Color Balance (Highlights, Midtones, Shadows)
- Curves (Gamma, Red, Green, Blue)

• New streamlined gallery
- Rapid document load
- New group design
- Share a group
- Quickly action any thumbnail

• Redesigned icon
• Orientation memory
• Includes latest SDKs for all styluses
• Bug fixes and many stability improvements
• Improved performance

我们不断受用户启发，旨在为您带来最出色的产品。为此，我们精心为您准备了一些礼物。就当成今天是您的生日啦。

- ColorDrop！只需拖动所选的颜色，将其放在要填充的地方。真是太简单了。这可不是您爷爷的颜料桶。

- 阈值调整！使用 ColorDrop 时继续按住，您可以滑动手指调整填充阈值，实现无缝颜色填充。

- 参考图层！这说明我们是如此在乎漫画家们。现在您无须影响油墨即可实现完美的填充。使用两根手指轻扫油墨图层，将其激活为参考图层。选择另一个图层，ColorDrop 可以根据参考图层填充所选图层。

- 色轮！使用新色环，拥有更多液体颜色选择。合并并分开手指可以扩大中心，并选择最佳底纹。

- 给出您的数字！Procreate 现在提供数字颜色输入功能，因此您可以准确获得所需的颜色。

- 更好样本！只需轻点一下即可将颜色存储为样本。若要删除样本，只需选择并将其丢掉。

- 样本调色板！创建自定义样本调色板，然后可以存储、命名以及排序。最重要的是，您可以轻松导出调色板与其他用户共享，以及从其他艺术家那里导入调色板。

- 多语言！Procreate 现在被翻译成 14 种语言，包括德语、日语、法语、意大利语、西班牙语、简体中文、繁体中文、韩语、葡萄牙语、俄语、土耳其语和阿拉伯语。

- 其他诸多功能！Procreate 2.1 还包括许多细微修复和性能提升，虽然您可能没注意到，但是我们保证它们非常有用。下面是其中部分亮点：

- 更新了所有手写笔 SDK
- 全新支持 53’s Pencil
- 新重新着色过滤器
- 从照片创建新画布
- 重新设计了画笔源界面
- 修饰了进度滑块界面
- 颜色提示框活动时，激活吸管
- 改进了图层手势，方便更好地滚动
- 绘图可以立即解除提示框
- 选择的画笔和图层现在突出显示 Procreate 蓝色
- 改进了选择和转换流程
- 重建了导入和导出系统，界面简单
- 改进了图库中作品命名
- 彻底重建了提示框系统，提高了可靠性

- 家庭作业！确保从 iBooks Store 和 Procreate 帮助菜单下免费下载最新版本的 Procreate 手册。

为了让我们能够为您推出更棒的产品，人们需要知道我们的产品非常好用。如果您喜欢这些礼物，请在 App Store 上留下简短的评论并告诉我们。在制作更棒的产品的过程中，我们会抽时间阅读您的评论。

在过去六个月里，我们一直待在研发室里，针对 iPad 不断进行改进。结果，我们进一步优化了 Procreate，从而充分利用 iPad Air 2 的强大功能，整合了 iOS 8 的灵活性，以及实现了长期以来我们一直专注的功能 - 手掌支撑。

手掌支撑类似于防止手掌误触，但是功能更强。它一直处于开启状态，您可以使用普通的电容式触控笔，甚至自己的手指。您最终可以将手掌放在 iPad 屏幕表面上使用手势，无需担心在画布上画出不想要的内容。手掌支撑完全透明，不会影响性能或您的流程。

iCloud Drive、AirDrop 和 AirPrint 现在可以通过全新的 iOS 8 共享在 Procreate 中访问。您现在可以从向和从 iCloud Drive 以及其他任何提供 iOS 8 扩展插件的存储服务导出和导入。

iPad Air 2 可以完美运行 Procreate，iPad Air 2 用户将会看到所有画布尺寸的图层上限增加了。

另外，我们还进行了其他一些改进。其中包括：

- 重建了 Procreate 的一些关键部分，从而改进了稳定性和内存使用情况
- 更新了所有手写笔 SDK
- 添加了吸管作为手写笔按钮选项
- 向图层选项按钮添加了“向下合并”
- 改进了“调色板库”界面
- 改进了“画笔设置”界面
- Procreate 内界面稍微进行了调整
- 修复了错误

• 全新白色界面
现在，在全新白色界面喜爱，您可以在户外绘图和绘画。在 Procreate 2.3 中，您只需点一下开关，整个界面就会过渡到美丽的全新白色界面，该界面专为在光线好的场景中使用而设计。

• 改进的 UI 项目
我们为您重新设计和改进了界面的每一处细节。

• 稳定性提升和错误修复
我们花了大量时间修复了许多错误，并且让应用程序响应更快、更稳定。下面是我们修复的部分错误：

- 修复了从另一个弹窗打开颜色弹窗影响保存颜色更改的问题
- 修复了取色器停用后启动应用程序时仍然可用的问题
- 修复了清除图层错误
- 修复了 ColorDrop 阈值问题
- 修复了 PSD 文件导出崩溃
- 修复了 .procreate 文件导出崩溃
- 修复了变换模式引起的剪切对象崩溃
- 修复了任何菜单打开时粘贴引起的崩溃
- 修复了数字键盘触摸问题
- 修复了使用颜色选取器时的各种问题
- 修复了选择蒙板错误
- 修复了数字颜色选取器手势
- 修复了使用 Palm Support 时图层有时清除的问题
- 修复了重启后图层不透明度重置的问题
- 修复了曲线控制点出现在曲线区域外的问题
- 修复了首次使用时 HSB 和颜色平衡滑块跳动的问题
- 修复了曲线滤镜在屏幕上时固定连续分配混乱的问题
- 修复了固定主要颜色弹窗手势的问题
- 修复了启动时图层按钮无法使用的问题

亲自体验 大师级画板 后，如果您能在 App Store 上给我们评分，我们会感激不尽。您的 App Store 评分对我们来说非常重要，它能帮助我们做得更好。

iOS 9 is here! Our boss told us to release a bug fix update, but after extensive experiments with flies, beetles, a lot of adhesive tape and one very angry wasp, we decided that wasn’t going to work for us. So while Dave’s swellings went down, we fixed all these problems with Procreate instead.


- Swiping between the colour picker and the palette library made Procreate so confused it would stop working. Using small words and big pictures we’ve taught it the difference, and now it copes much better.
- Sometimes activating Reference Layer would look like it worked, but it really didn’t. This was very funny but not very useful.
- Under iOS 9, selecting a Wacom device crashed the app. We locked Procreate and Wacom styli in a room and didn’t let them out until they decided to get along.
- Multiply blend mode and some Adjustments were very broken. They’re better now.
- Swatch palettes didn’t want to go where you put them, now they do what they’re told.
- Exporting a PSD file by email will now actually work.
- We fixed an issue where copying a selection while in Transform mode would copy the entire layer instead.
- We also thought it would be great if the video recording setting actually enabled you to turn video recording on or off. Radical, we know.
- Changing your background colour used to also change your selected colour. While this was inclusive and heartwarming, it wasn’t overly practical.
- Using the eyedropper from a stylus button reset your previous colour. Now for the eight of you that use this feature, it will work properly.
- The Adonit SDK really liked putting things in the top left corner of the screen. With great effort, we’ve coaxed it back to the actual canvas.
- Support for the Hex3 Jaja has been removed, and there was much rejoicing.

If you haven’t seen yet, we’ve just made a big announcement - Procreate 3 is coming. This free update for existing users will be our biggest release yet, and it’ll be out by the end of 2015. For more information, check out http://procreate.si

This holiday season, one app must finish what it started.

- New improvements for Apple Pencil which make the start of a stroke extremely responsive.
- Fixed Tilt values that were too large for some brushes, although all tilt sizes are beautiful.
- Fixed occasional blobs at the beginning of Apple Pencil strokes.
- There is now a Softness setting for each brush. Additional softening gives better results on glazed brushes.
- There are significant improvements to stroke taper. Now we want to stroke a tapir. Have you seen those things? So cute.
- 6B Compressed and Wood brushes have correct sidebar defaults.
- If you reset a brush it also resets the brush preview.
- Once you went into a Gallery group in Compact mode you could never, ever leave. The Back button is now more than just a tease.
- We fixed issues with rotations on Eyedropper, pinching/zooming, and Instant Replay.
- Your FiftyThree Pencil, Pogo Connect and Jot Touch 4 stylii are stylin’ once more.
- We have resolved issues sometimes experienced when purchasing Early Access. Probably.
- Renaming a layer no longer sometimes makes the layer interface vanish. Yeah, nah.
- We've added some improvements for non-French speaking Italians

• Selecting brushes and layers with Apple Pencil was pretty difficult but now you can actually tap them.

• Some changes in Procreate 3 meant that performance would get sluggish when you made really, really long strokes. We found this out from a guy who set up a harmonograph that made continuous brush strokes in Procreate. We made it better.

• No one really needs a pencil with an eraser at both ends, so Pencil by FiftyThree now like… you know… draws.

• We discovered that if you swiped left on a layer and then tapped in the 1-pixel space between the layers menu and the screen edge in just the right way, the app would freeze. We decided this wasn't the kind of easter egg you might like, so now it just closes the swipe menu.

We're cooking up a seriously beefy update, so stay tuned. In the meantime, if you're an app connoisseur please leave a review on the App Store.

Procreate 3.1 是我们 2016 年的最大更新。其中的诸多新功能均可加快创作速度。

自动选择
只需轻点一下，即可选择您作品的任意区域。

Streamline
Streamline 画笔设置可以稳固您的描边，从而形成完美的曲线和花体。

快捷菜单
打开“快捷菜单”，在不中断绘画的情况下立即获取您喜爱的功能。

自定义画布
通过像素、毫米、厘米或英寸，以及跟踪 DPI 来创建画布。存储、重新排列、编辑和删除您所创建的任何画布。

通过“修改”按钮，您可以更加快速、准确地激活吸管。

将任一作品导出为 PDF，且可以从三个质量选项中进行选择；或者一次性将多个作品导出到一个 PDF 文件中。

自定义倾斜角度
现在，您可以自定义通过 Apple Pencil 调用的倾斜角度。

4K
现在可以为 iPad Air 2 及更高版本录制高达 4K 分辨率的视频。

画布翻转
通过画布翻转功能，可以保持您的缩放程度和位置。

另外，我们还对透视参考线、压力曲线、在当前图层上粘贴的功能进行了改进，并修复了诸多错误。如果您喜欢 Procreate 3.1，请在 App Store 上对其稍加评论，我们将不胜感激。

Now that iOS 10 has arrived, this is the last update for the iPad 2, iPad mini 1 and iPad 3. We wanted these devices to have the best possible version of Procreate for as long as they're around. With this in mind, there were a few final bugs we had to stomp, and screws that needed tightening.

- Increases in memory usage from recent updates caused instability with large canvas sizes. We've optimised Procreate's usage of memory as much as possible, so crashes at these canvas sizes should now be drastically reduced.

- Now when you hit Restore Purchases, it will actually restore all your purchases, including the Earth Brushes. It's a novel idea, we know.

- As part of a recent update, the Calligraphy Brush gained a drop shadow. Turns out that you can just draw shadows when you want them, so we made this not happen.

- Sometimes, Procreate would decide that your Layer Opacity (and many other adjustments) should be set to 0.0%, and then refuse to let you have any say in the matter. We've now put control of this back in your hands.

- When you were using Recolor, you couldn't actually change your color at all. This was so ridiculous that we're not even going to make a joke about it. It's fixed now.

To those of you using older devices, it's been an amazing journey, and we hope you'll join us again soon. For iOS 10 users, we've got some big plans in store for later this year. Stay tuned.

Like an ex that won't stop calling, we're back for one last release with our older device users. After all, we've had a lot of fun together. Haven't we?

- We just haven’t been communicating like we used to. When using Procreate in a language other than English, certain export options had completely disappeared. It took a lot of 3AM texts, but we got them to come back.

- When actively using Palm Support with some third-party styluses, Procreate would crash to the Gallery. It’s not you, it’s us. We’ve changed.

- When exporting images, there were certain buttons that became a little attached. Like us, they had trouble letting go. We've had a chat, and they're doing much better now.

We promise we’re done. Our next release will target iOS 10.

Welcome to our smallest update ever!

Jam packed with a single feature: this release is fully optimized for the new iPad Pro's ProMotion technology with a refresh rate of 120Hz. Procreate feels blazingly fast and silky smooth.

Because we love you even if you don't have a new iPad Pro, we've also included improvements for Adonit users, and support for the Wacom Bamboo Sketch and new Wacom Bamboo Fineline.

Though this update is little, keep your eyes peeled over the coming weeks. We've got a very special release coming in the Fall, and we'll be telling you all about it very soon.

性能和稳定性
Procreate 现在支持 Siica M，一个专为 iOS 设计的全新绘画引擎。 Procreate 现在完全基于 Metal 构建，速度快了四倍。

全新调漆
体验全新湿画和烟熏效果。在画布上混合和调漆，实现液体和准确搅拌。

图层蒙板
通过图层蒙板，您可以选择显示图层的哪些部分，不丢失原始内容的任何部分。

重调的界面
几乎 Procreate 中的每个像素都经过精心设计，让您的工作流程更快、更简单。

画笔混合模式
增强了画笔的功能，在一层上即可创建出新的效果。

P3 广色域
广色域 iPad 现在可以创建和导出全广色域艺术作品。

拖放
将图像、图层、画笔或调色板拖放到其他营业程序，或者从其他应用程序拖放。

图库
通过全新重建的 Procreate 图库，您可以轻松管理成千上万个作品。

AirPlay 画布
将任何显示屏变成艺术作品的实景。激活 AirPlay 画布可以将整个画布映射到另一个屏幕上。

常规改进

另外，还有许多细微改进，如果您喜欢  Procreate，请在 App Store 上留下评论。

• We fixed a crash that sometimes happened if you had an appetite for distortion.
• You can now safely use 'Add to Procreate` after choosing questionable files
• If you've purchased the Earth brushes set, they're now back in black.
• We have improved the Calligraphy Set translations for Italian, French, Arabic or Turkish customers.
• The new Grade slider allows you to soften wet brushes for new effects. Looks so good makes a grown man cry.
